name: forget-password-server
description: - SignUp check the existing database and update the new user   - By default inactive account is created and a activation link will be sent to the user email through node mailer - Login check the user data and allow the login - Endpoint to resend the activation email - Forgot Password creates a temporary token and send a mail to the user to update the password - Gets a Full URL from user and create a Hsort URL - when the Short URL is clicked it will Redirect the user to Full URL - Update the Short URL Count everytime the short url is clicked
